plays.text: Goal scored by Ivan Novoseltsev assisted by Stephen Weiss and Brad Ference
Penalty to Matt Cullen 2 minutes for Hooking Nikolai Antropov
Penalty to Wade Belak 2 minutes for Interference Byron Ritchie
Penalty to Ivan Novoseltsev 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding Wade Belak
Penalty to Jay Bouwmeester 2 minutes for Closing Hand on Puck(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Olli Jokinen 2 minutes for Slashing Gary Roberts
Penalty to Aki Berg 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding Olli Jokinen
Penalty to Wade Belak 2 minutes for Slashing Viktor Kozlov
Penalty to Robert Svehla 2 minutes for Hooking Marcus Nilson
Penalty to Mathieu Biron 2 minutes for Slashing Nikolai Antropov
Goal scored by Stephen Weiss assisted by Niklas Hagman
Penalty to Olli Jokinen 2 minutes for Roughing Darcy Tucker
Goal scored by Alexander Mogilny assisted by Tomas Kaberle and Robert Svehla
